name: Crumbs, Lots of Crumbs
description:
This is our upload for the 'Mundane' Game Jam, hosted by 8 Bits to Infinity. The game starts off as a peaceful time in the park, feeding pigeons, but quickly 'decays' into something else entirely. Had a blast figuring our way through this one, and if you don't get the reference of the title right away, hopefully by the end you'll understand ; ) 

The only control is the mouse click. 

Everything was made from scratch, by hand, by us. Script, sights and sounds. Thought about sampling music for the second half, but turned out to be more fun and effective to just make it up. Hope you guys enjoy playing this as much as we enjoyed making it!

Power Knapp Studio is

Joe Knapp - Code

Zach Knapp - Art, Music
